Diseases associated with a gene.

Source: R/monarchr.R

bioentity_disease_assoc_w_gene.Rd

Given a gene, what diseases are associated with it.

bioentity_disease_assoc_w_gene(gene)

Arguments

gene

A valid monarch initiative gene id.

Value

A list of (tibble of homolog information, monarch_api S3 class).

Details

https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/bioentity/gene/NCBIGene

Examples

gene <- "NCBIGene:8314"
bioentity_disease_assoc_w_gene(gene)
#> $diseases
#> # A tibble: 25 x 9
#>    subject.taxon subject.id subject relation  object   object.id evidence
